nodes.text: The Albrae-Don system was located in the Sern sector, a part of the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. It contained the astronomical object Albrae-Don, which had a sea on its surface.

At some point after the date 36:10:4, the terrorist organization known as the Justice Action Network carried out a bombing of the Pica Rim Pipeline, an underwater monorail train transit tunnel on Albrae-Don. At the time of the bombing, a monorail in the tunnel was carrying approximately 4,000 passengers and workers.
The Albrae-Don system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square L-13.
